mapper.select: SELECT b.FCONTACTUNIT AS customerId, d.FNAME AS billType, b.FBillNo AS billNo, b.FDATE AS billDate, a.FAMOUNT AS amount, a.FCOMMENT AS note, b.FDocumentStatus AS documentStatus FROM T_AR_OTHERRECABLEENTRY a JOIN T_AR_OTHERRECABLE b ON a.FID = b.FID LEFT JOIN T_BAS_BILLTYPE_L d ON b.FBILLTYPEID = d.FBILLTYPEID WHERE b.FDATE >=#{dateStart} AND b.FDATE <=#{dateEnd} and b.FCONTACTUNIT = #{customerId}
